channel.title: C on Simon Willshire
channel.description: Recent content in C on Simon Willshire

item.title: Networking
item.description:
Original Course Papers (2015)

  • Analog to Digital, Nyquist Theorem, Shannon’s Theorem, Latency data loss, Hamming Codes (PDF)
  • MACA Protocol, Manchester Encoding, Multicast Spanning Tree, BGP, VANET, iMANET, IPv4 to IPv6 address conversion, Wireshark (PDF)
  • CDNs, Encryption: DES, Lotus Notes, Dual EC DRBG, HTTPS and SSL Decryption, Truecrypt, OTR, TOR, Zoho, PGP (PDF)

item.title: Linear Genetic Programming
item.description:
Original Course Paper (2014)

This paper was written for an artificial intelligence course (COIS-4550H) in 2014. It examines a self-programming program using genetic algorithm techniques (with a fitness evaluation).

  • Linear Genetic Programming (PDF)
